entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 600 metres rising to 900 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 900 metres lowering to 600 metres after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 600 metres rising to 900 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023
